title: naming
description: A categorically grouped set of strings used for naming in game entities.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

name.description: Grouping of these naming strings. This property was in existence and standard before it clashed uncomfortably in this context.

namings.description: List of names under this naming grouping.
